@@ -27,6 +23,8 @@ import ora from "ora"
 import prompts from "prompts"
 import * as z from "zod"

discussion_comments.comment_body:
To respect the syntax used in the other files, use the aliased import:
```ts
import { getInitialValues } from "@/src/utils/get-initial-values"
```
